parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of strings with description of all vehicle's magazines, their ammo count (current/default) and their ids. 

When applied to a unit (soldier), the command behaves differently and will omit magazines already loaded into unit's weapons. Use [[currentMagazineDetail]] to get this information for a currently loaded magazine.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''magazinesDetail''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[magazinesDetail]] [vehicle, includeEmpty] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.99.146475</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [vehicle, includeEmpty]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> includeEmpty: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) [[true]] to include empty magazines

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesDetail = [[magazinesDetail]] [[player]];
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/*
[
	"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id:3]",
	"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id:9]",
	"9mm 16Rnd Mag(16/16)[id:12]",
	"Smoke Grenade (Green)(1/1)[id:14]",
	"Chemlight (Green)(1/1)[id:16]",
	"RGO Frag Grenade(1/1)[id:18]"
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>*/</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesDetail = [[magazinesDetail]] Mi_48;
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment/*
[
	"30mm APDS shells(250/250)[id:20]",
	"30mm HE Shells(250/250)[id:21]",
	"Scalpel E2(8/8)[id:22]",
	"Skyfire(38/38)[id:23]"
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>*/</title></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentMagazineDetail]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[magazinesDetailUniform]], [[magazinesDetailVest]], [[magazinesDetailBackpack]]
</value></part></template></root>
